author: Jamie Crawley
title: Trump Media, Owner of Truth Social, Looks to Issue $12B Worth of New Shares
description: The parent company of social media platform Truth Social registered with the SEC  to issue up 84,657,181 shares of Common Stock.
content:
President Donald Trump's media company has registered up to $12 billion in new securities, according to a new S-3 filing.
Trump Media and Technology Group (DJT), parent company of social media platf… [+539 chars]
